data.name: DecayZ Origin
data.detailed_description:
In 2055, after the Z virus spread around the world, the Z virus altered the DNA strands in almost all living things. cause mutations turn most of the creatures into mutants. People who are unable to undergo genetic changes will die and become zombies but this is not the end. The remaining survivors must find a way to survive.

DecayZ Origin is built with Unreal Engine 4 and will expand throughout the Early Access period

Explore

Each location telling it's own story and filled with dangers.

Never be alone

Survive the wasteland with your lovely dog

FEATURES IN CURRENT GAME

The following features are available in the game as it is available now. Please continue to check this area and the Steam forums for updates to features and additions through the Early Access period.


  • Single Player Sandbox
  • Day/Time Simulation
  • Inventory System
  • Hunger / Thirsty System
  • Pet System
  • Basic Movement System
  • Basic Combat System [Melee Weapons, Firearms]

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
The developers describe the content like this:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

data.short_description: In 2055, after the Z virus spread around the world, the Z virus altered the DNA strands in almost all living things. cause mutations turn most of the creatures into mutants. People who are unable to undergo genetic changes will die and become zombies but this is not the end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
